# Pre-lecture activities

# Lecture

## Learning objectives

::: callout-note
### Learning objectives

**At the end of class you will be able to:**

-   Generate and navigate a quarto document
-   Understand what packages are and how to use them
-   Get data in and out of R
-   Recognize and create various data types in R
:::

# Post-lecture Practice

To get more practice working with data in R complete the following homework. You will be asked to **upload your activities for a course grade**.

::: callout-important
### Homework

1.  In RStudio, install and load the swirl package

    `install.packages("swirl")`

    `library("swirl")`

2. Start Swirl by typing the following command

    `swirl()`

3. Please enter your full name together when asked what you want to be called by e.g. JaneDoe

4. Complete lessons 1 to 15

    ![](../images/L02/index_L02/list_of_swirl_lessons.png){width=300}

5. At the end of each lesson the following question will appear, enter the selection 2 for Yes to be redirected to your autofilled Google Form submission

    ![](../images/L02/index_L02/google_form_redirect.png){width=500}
    
6. Once you've been redirected, your Swirl activity will be autofilled into the submission box, just hit the Submit button

    ![](../images/L02/index_L02/google_form_submission.png){width=500}
:::
